casebody.data:
Officers of Court vs. Wyatt. Jackson, Justice.

[Warner, Chief Justice, was providentially prevented from presiding in this case.]

1. Where four defendants are jointly indicted and jointly tried, the clerk of court, under section 3695 of the (lode, is only entitled to five dollars costs.

2. In such a case, under section 3696, the sheriff is not entitled to costs for taking the four appearance bonds — no provision being made in said section or elsewhere for such costs.
